small protection deity - 3 ac
small resisting deity - +2 charisma, +2 sv disease, +2 sv magic

And, as mentioned in a previous post, they are cleric, druid, shaman only
... and are at the moment broken, because they cannot be equipped and do not
give the bonuses when placed in a general inventory slot. Soooo, don't do
what I did just yet ... and give a bunch of them away to poor unsuspecting
newbies ^_^;;.

Kishu Arashi
25th cycle Wood Elf Ranger
